node.name: ProjectKoach
node.shortdescription:
ProjectKoach brings your whole agile process into Eclipse and gives you a wealth of powerful features to help you take your agile projects from start to finish without ever leaving your workspace.
Centered around a free-form, file-based requirements backlog and a visual iteration plan editor, ProjectKoach features complete support for, amongst other, the popular Scrum method, including point estimation, repeatable process patterns, and built-in progress charts that allow you to gauge your team’s productivity with burn-up, burn-down and velocity charts.
Integrated with Mylyn, you can import your team’s defects from your external bug tracker right into your iteration plans, so you can plan those together with your other backlog items.
Your project environment can include any mix of free basic and license-based Premium ProjectKoach installations for optimal team performance at the lowest possible cost.
ProjectKoach is available both as Eclipse plug-in and RCP application for all major platforms.
